about.section.label: About section
about.title: About
about.subtitle: A bit of context and what I focus on.
about.card.label: Personal description
about.p1: I'm Aydin, a frontend developer focused on building modern, clear, and well-structured websites.
about.p2: I specialize in landing pages, portfolios, and product websites with a clean, responsive, easy-to-use design. My goal is to make your site look professional, work well on any device, and be ready to use without complications.
projects.section.label: Projects section
projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Projects. Examples of modern websites for different types of business.
projects.grid.label: Projects grid
project.barber.title: Barber Studio Landing
project.barber.desc: Modern landing page for a barbershop. Designed to present services, highlight the brand style, and drive bookings.
project.barber.links.label: Links for Barber Studio Landing project
project.restaurant.title: Restaurant Business Website
project.restaurant.desc: Restaurant website focused on visual presentation. Featured menu, clear sections, and reservation CTAs.
project.restaurant.links.label: Links for Restaurant Business Website project
project.trainer.title: Personal Trainer Landing
project.trainer.desc: Landing page for a personal trainer. Built to present plans, build trust, and convert visits into contacts.
project.trainer.links.label: Links for Personal Trainer Landing project
services.section.label: Services section
services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Frontend-focused solutions to improve your digital presence.
services.grid.label: Available services
service.one.title: Modern Website Creation
service.one.desc: I create modern and responsive websites using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Perfect for personal brands, small businesses and startups.
service.two.title: Website Design Upgrade
service.two.desc: I redesign and modernize existing websites. Cleaner layout, better spacing and improved mobile experience.
service.three.title: Frontend Fixes
service.three.desc: I fix layout issues, broken sections and responsive problems. Quick solutions without unnecessary complexity.

contact.card.lead: I create landing pages, portfolios, and modern websites.
contact.card.body: For projects and commissions, contact me directly through Fiverr. There we can discuss your idea and get started quickly.
